## PlayAnimationOptions type

Options for playing an animation.

Controls looping, playback speed (including reverse), and fade-in blending.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type PlayAnimationOptions = {
    repeat?: number;
    speedRatio?: number;
    fadeIn?: number;
    weight?: number;
};
```
